overview:
Mike Sullivan is CEO and co-founder of Affine Systems, a company providing sophisticated inventory intelligence for online video advertising.

He has more than a decade of experience building and commercializing computer vision technology. In his current role as CEO, Mike is responsible for establishing the overall direction, strategy and vision for Affine. He leads all facets of the business, including operations, product development, marketing and sales.

Prior to co-founding Affine, Mike worked at the Institute for Defense Analyses (IDA), where he performed research and technical analysis supporting the Department of Defense and Intelligence Community. He graduated from Harvard University with a S.M. in Applied Mathematics and an A.B. in Computer Science. He currently lives in San Francisco with his wife.
